isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING

step1.para: Install the 4th-5th speed shift bar and yoke ( Figure 147). Install the yoke lockscrew, tighten, and wire securely. Keep the bar in the neutral position.

figure.caption: Figure 147. Install 4th-5th Speed Shift Bar and Yoke

note.para: Shift bar lockscrews should be tightened to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).

caution.para: DO NOT EXCEED the recommended torque ratings for yoke lockscrews as over-tightening may distort the shift bars.

step1.para: Install interlock ball in the vertical bore of the front web ( Figure 148).

figure.caption: Figure 148. Install Interlock Ball in Vertical Bore of Front Web

step1.para: Install the actuating plunger in the rear web ( Figure 149).

figure.caption: Figure 149. Install Actuating Plunger in Rear Web

step1.para: Install the 2nd-3rd speed shift bar and yoke, inserting the interlock pin in the bore of the neutral notch ( Figure 150). Install the yoke lockscrew, tighten and wire securely.

figure.caption: Figure 150. Install 2nd-3rd Speed Shift Bar and Yoke

step1.para: Install interlock ball in the front web ( Figure 151).

figure.caption: Figure 151. Install Interlock Ball in Front Web

step1.para: Install the reverse-stop plunger in the reverse yoke ( Figure 152). Make sure the plunger is fully seated in the bore.

figure.caption: Figure 152. Install Reverse-Stop Plunger in Reverse Yoke

step1.para: Install the spring in the bore and on the plunger ( Figure 153).

figure.caption: Figure 153. Install Spring in Bore and on Plunger

step1.para: Partially install the plug. Use the tip of the gear shift lever to push the plunger back into the bore to compress the spring ( Figure 154). Tighten the plug fully and then back off 1/2 to 1-1/2 turns. Stake the plug threads in the hole.

figure.caption: Figure 154. Push Plunger Back to Compress Spring

step1.para: Install 1st-reverse shift bar and yoke ( Figure 155). Install yoke lockscrew, tighten and wire securely.

figure.caption: Figure 155. Install 1st-Reverse Shift Bar and Yoke

step1.para: Remove the assembly from the vise. Install the three tension balls, one in each bore on the housing top ( Figure 156).
Install the tension springs on top of the balls in the bores ( Figure 157).
Install the tension spring cover. Tighten two bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m) ( Figure 158).
